mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NUM, R.GOODS_NUM, R.MEMBER_NUM, R.REVIEW_CNT, R.REVIEW_REGDATE, R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_IMG, M.MEMBER_ID, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_DCPRICE, F.GOODS_IMG1 FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M, GOODS G, GOODS_IMG F WHERE M.MEMBER_NUM=R.MEMBER_NUM AND G.GOODS_NUM=R.GOODS_NUM AND F.GOODS_NUM=R.GOODS_NUM ORDER BY REVIEW_NUM DESC

SELECT R.REVIEW_NUM, R.GOODS_NUM, R.MEMBER_NUM, R.REVIEW_CNT, R.REVIEW_REGDATE, R.REVIEW_GRADE, R.REVIEW_IMG, M.MEMBER_ID, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_DCPRICE, F.GOODS_IMG1 FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M, GOODS G, GOODS_IMG F WHERE R.MEMBER_NUM=M.MEMBER_NUM AND R.GOODS_NUM=G.GOODS_NUM AND G.GOODS_NUM=F.GOODS_NUM
AND G.GOODS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{SearchKeyword} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(A.REVIEW_NUM) AS CNT FROM REVIEW A
